issue.title: File header content
issue.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

Files header are supposed to be : 

```

/**
 * @version     4.0.0
 * @package     com_easysdi_[component]
 * @copyright   Copyright (C) 2013. All rights reserved.
 * @license     GNU General Public License version 2 or later; see LICENSE.txt
 * @author      EasySDI Community <contact@easysdi.org> - http://www.easysdi.org
 */
```


But :
- some files present other headers with developer name and no reference to project...
- version must be upgraded to 4.3.x

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.2

comments.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

File header should be ;

```

/**
 * @version     4.x.x
 * @package     com_easysdi_[component]
 * @copyright   Copyright (C) 2013-2015. All rights reserved.
 * @license     GNU General Public License version 3 or later; see LICENSE.txt
 * @author      EasySDI Community <contact@easysdi.org> - http://www.easysdi.org
 */
```


LICENCE.txt : file is missing, should be added at the root administrator rep. 


An automatic update of the headers should be add to the continious integration.
